official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the two-year waiting period for divorced spouse's benefits following the divorce.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the two-year waiting period for divorced spouse's benefits following a divorce in cases of prior receipt of spouse's benefits.
